title: RF Software Engineer
summary: Do you have a passion for invention and self-challenge? As part of a world class modem team, you’ll help innovate new cellular technologies that continually outperform previous iterations.
description: Design and Implement RF device drivers and RF software to control RF transceivers and RF front-end components with detailed timing requirements. Work with multi-functional teams to lead dependencies while driving key Radio features.
key_qualifications: Minimum BS with 10 + years of relevant industry experience. Strong knowledge of mobile communications in 4G/5G 3GPP protocols and radio architecture. Solid knowledge of RF transceiver and RF front end components control. Strong understanding of RF calibrations for compensating RF impairments. Deep understanding of software engineering principles. Excellent in embedded C/C++ programming. Experience with using RF Test equipment for RF validation and debugging. Familiarity with JTAG.
education_experience: Minimum BS with 10 + years of relevant industry experience
